price: A faraon, i oni prije njega i prevrnuta naselja grijehe činiše,
arabic: وَجَآءَ فِرۡعَوۡنُ وَمَن قَبۡلَهُۥ وَٱلۡمُؤۡتَفِكَٰتُ بِٱلۡخَاطِئَةِ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: wajāa fir'ʿawnu waman qablahu wal-mu'tafikātu bil-khāṭi-ati
